summary: Add an integration test to verify that Workflows are automatically retried when experiencing multiple consecutive timeouts. This ensures the retry behavior works correctly end-to-end in the TypeScript SDK.
userImpact: Ensures reliability of workflow retry behavior under timeout conditions, providing confidence that production workflows will retry correctly.
proposedFix: Add an integration test to the TypeScript SDK that verifies workflows are retried when experiencing multiple consecutive timeouts.
resolutionDetails: Integration test was implemented to verify retry behavior on consecutive timeouts
keyQuote: WFT timeout is configurable and server behavior might change and make this test obsolete but this is good enough.
